PRO Version Get PRO Version \'Atomic - Periodic Table\' is a free and open-source application made by me on my spare-time in Sweden. Buy purchasing the PRO-version you help support the development of additional features as well as unlocking some more. Tables pH-Indicators A pH-indicator table for colors on different acid/ base levels Electrochemical Series A table with an electrochemical series, sorted by (-) to (+) voltage Formulas A table containing formulas for math, physics and chemistry Solubility Table A table with information of different substances solubility Ionization Energies A table with different elements ionization energies Poisson Ratio Table A table with poissons ratio for different rocks, soils, minerals and other materials Table of Nuclides A two-dimensional table of nuclide, with color differentiating decay type A table that contains common constants for calculations including math, physics, standard water flows etc Geology Table A table that contains information about minerals, rocks and soils

Emission Spectrum Table Emission spectrum for elements, which is the frequencies of electromagnatic radiation emitted due to electrons making transition from a higher to lower energy state.
